name: Across Dimensions (Nuno "Omega Leo" Diogo)
description:
Lewis and Simon have been sent to opposite dimensions after an accident with one of their experiments in YogLabs, your goal is to help them get back together to their original dimension.

This is an entry for the Yogscast Game Jam 2021.

Theme

Opposites

Assets used

Music

Retro Reggae.ogg - Kenney Game Assets Pack 1

SFX

-metalLatch.ogg - Kenney Game Assets Pack 1

-rest was made with SFXR

Font

Atari Classic by Marc Simonson
